text: Úrsula Murayama (born in Mexico in 1972) is a Mexican actress of Japanese originCine español de los 90: diccionario de películas, directores y temático by Francisco María Benavent who appears in telenovelas (soap operas). Her best known role was that of handmaiden Jacinta in telenovela Esmeralda (1997). Her possible relative was actor Noé Murayama, who died in 1997. He appeared with Úrsula in Esmeralda. Other roles: * Hijos del viento - Princess TizcuitlHijos Del Viento (DVD)Entdeckung, Eroberung, Inszenierung: filmische Versionen der Kolonialgeschichte Lateinamerikas und Afrikas by Monika Wehrheim and Ute Fendler. title: Úrsula Murayama
